topics.body: Precure fairy pet simulator would be at its best if they can interact with fairies from other Precure shows. (I like the idea of Seeing Hummy And Dabi bouncing off of each other.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf28de636872580be43500#post_54bf28de636872580be43500
[bq="ToskiHero"]"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bf242d636872573a740d00#post_54bf242d636872573a740d00
Uhh, what now?
Honestly I have no idea if you're serious or you're screwing with me. Then again, what do I know? Honestly, [spoiler]if Eren can come back from the dead and become a muthafriggin Titan that can kill the ever living crap out of other Titans, then anything is likely.[/spoiler]

Then again, I'd might as well watch all of Evangelion, or rewatch FLCL, if I want my brain screwed with. Or I could just read YouTube comments, or SJW rambles, or whatever witty thing Jerry Peet wants to "talk about". [/bq]
Nope, I am serious and not screwing with you.
You will like the part of the horses, there is a surprise there.
